column1: happy birthday to my absolute best friend. we've been through everything and still have a long way to… rt girls be like love me like you do.. rt my tweet wasn't about you but rt will ferrell is the new face of #littledebbiesnackcakes #fallontonight "but you, god, see the trouble of the afflicted; you consider their grief and take it in hand. the… rt basically 💅 rt if ur having a bad day... i got u 🐶 that v6 will get up and go 😍😍😍 rt do you feel like my tweets are directed at you? if the shoe fits.....lace it up. well ok then 👌 rt hes so gorgeous 😍 rt when bae pisses you off rt ever get someone out of ur life and realize who they really are and it makes you feel really good about getting them out … rt "it's so fluffy i'm gonna die" rt tired of trying. rt she might cry now, she'll forgive you and act like everything's okay. but eventually, she's going to pack her bags and … rt my hopes are always way too high rt "i don't know what my future holds, but i know who holds my future." rt "what's your gpa" rt i have a bad tendency of staying up past 1am literally every night rt .....whatever rt brushing the cats teeth 💀😭 rt i am dying rt state tournament notebook: softball taking a back seat east webster diamond girls busy trying to wi… rt this is so amazing because receiving one page letters makes life more bearable without you here. i love you so much.… rt exactly! rt instagram vs real life rt share the w! alabama shuts out ole miss 6-0 to open sec play #bamasb #rolltide rt alabama opens conference play with a 6-0 win against ole miss rt the inning ends with an out at first, but marisa runyon's grand slam gives the tide a 4-0 lead heading into the top of the 2… rt when you're about to go to sleep and remember you forgot to do your homework rt i think we need to delay school. there's ice outside rt i like my bed more than i like most people rt i really just want to curl up on the couch with a blanket, a tub of ice cream and watch grey's anatomy rt *removes cute emojis from your name in my contacts cause i don’t like you anymore* rt this mom gets it rt a girl can be your best friend, wife, worst enemy, or worst nightmare. it just depends on how you treat her. rt a real boyfriend and girlfriend stand by each others side on good days and stands even closer on bad days no matter wh… rt unconditional love 💗👌 rt relationship goals 😍🐻💕 rt “everyone has their off days” i tell myself 15 days in a row rt the best gummies of all time rt food makes me more happy than anyone can can i just go back and restart these last 2 years? rt me: *looks at phone for 10 seconds* adult: woah gee golly you cant go 10 minutes without digging your head in your phone… rt this is amazing rt nights like this, i just want to board my flight to thailand, right now. rt hot summer nights, mid july when you and i were forever wild rt "retweet" to enter to win the ultimate spring break giveaway valued over $500! good luck! rt until you.... rt i'm just tired😔 rt jesus did not magically remove all human problems, but rather subjected himself to the same hardships that we face. #ss🎀 rt haylie mccleney with a big sacrifice fly to right field to drive in the winning run! alabama wins the game and the series 2-1 rt how to keep your boyfriend: rt twitter since yesterday is it really necessary for you to be so mean when we are just having a conversation? 😥 rt girls 6 feet tall saying "i hate not knowing where i stand". you stand under the basket and get rebounds. that's where. rt if i said i wasn't missin' you, i'd be lyin' rt how to avoid feelings: a lesson from pooh i don't even care anymore.... only 100 days until i change my last name! 😍 i love you babe jacobh11 this snow sure makes me miss nd and my fiancé 💔 i sure did love playing in the snow with my sweet brother and sister 😊❄️⛄️ steadman household hey guys, my stepmom had started a business called "khloe's closet" she can monogram, vinyl,… #mcm to my sweet fiancé. this is your last week of training and then you're done! good luck on your… can these next 3 months fly by? i'm so ready to marry my best friend 😊💜 just have to be strong until next time. it was great seeing you again and i'm so sad you had to leave today but hopefully i will see you again… this day went by way too fast. i'm not ready for jacob to leave in the morning 😢😭😔 this is by far the best surprise i've ever had. i'm so happy you came down today to see me even if… i sure am missing his guy some kind of bad today. 😢 rt there is power in the name of jesus. #mm & #mcm to my sweet fiancé. only 110 more days until we say "i do" i'm so glad god put you in my… happy valentines day from 1,450 miles away! i hope you enjoyed your gifts i got you! i love you so… only 3 more weeks until i'm back with my fiancé! i sure do miss him 😊💜💍 mamaw left this morning from tupelo and she is now in eupora hospital for physical therapy and when… mamaw left this morning and is headed to eupora hospital for physical therapy. 💪😁😊💜 rt i'm a christian. i'm not perfect. just because i mess up sometimes doesn't mean i'm fake. there's no such thing as a perfec… this girl got in her wheelchair all by herself! i'm so proud of her. she still has limited mobility… so proud of how tough this woman is! my mamaw is the strongest person i know and i'm so grateful she's doing good! 🙏🙌 i got this message one year ago from my mamaw and on this day i'm proud of her. for how strong she is… everyone say a prayer for my sweet mamaw. she had a stroke this morning and is now in tupelo. be… rt where you'll go, i'll go where you'll stay, i'll stay. rt 👏👏 learn this thanks for being the best fiancé ever. i love my garmin forerunner and it's my favorite color! i love… rt to me you'll always be 18, and beautiful... and dancing away with my heart. 🎤 my 3 year old sister just said, "hey awwie, let's talk about jesus." 😊 that's just too precious! #mcm to the hottest conductor on the railroad 😉🚂 i miss your goofy self and i'm so ready to see you… rt i needed this "i will praise you in this storm." ☝️🙏🙌 of course i will play dolls with my 3 year old sister 😄😊 just because i miss you and i love you. thanks for always being here for me whenever i need you. i… rt we should make plans-counting on god to direct us. proverbs 16:9 just because i miss you and i sure hope i get to have a road trip with jhughey71 and johnny to come… rt whatever god calls you to do he equips you to do as well. rt this is so me 😂 if god brings you to it, he will bring you through it. rt congratulations to katrina wilson, autumn bonner for gpas over 3.5 in the fall i love spending the day with my nephew jordanshea2012 that poptart that one time. #mcm to this very sweet guy. i wish i was there more than anything but i know we've got a great future… rt ufo caught on tape rt to everyone that goes back to school tomorrow rt one of my biggest goals is to not have my kids wonder if they're going to their mom's or dad's house first on holidays left my heart on the other side of the country 😔😢😭 home sweet home it sure was hard saying bye to you again, but i am ready to see you again in june! happy new years,… i really don't want to leave and head home today 😭💔 today is my last full day with you before i leave to go back home tomorrow. i sure am going to miss… rt to the boys who try everyday to put a smile on their girlfriend's face. rt current mood rt if someone did this for me i'd cry 😭😍 rt heart-breaking news to pass along tonight: east webster girls basketball coach & former oak hill academy coach stan hughey… definitely bae 💍💜 we went to canada yesterday while out site seeing. i love you babe! jacobh11 standing on a lake. i'm so glad i get to spend time with you. i love you so much! jacobh11 i love my fiancé so much ☺️💜💍 so glad to see you again baby. i love you so much and the snow 😊💜❄️ jacobh11 rt my mom is either my best friend or satan, there is no in between rt merica. when people ask you if you and your sister are twins. ha. no. i love spending christmas time with my family and siblings 😊😁 jordanshea2012 only missing… if these 3 days don't hurry up! i'm ready to see my boyfriend 😁😊💜 #mcm to the best bf ever. only 3 more days until you get to see me 😉 i love you baby jacobh11 you'll live when your brother talks you into putting a cat in your trunk 😂 rt nothing like being with someone you know is yours❤️💯😍💍 rt once a woman starts feeling unappreciated you've messed up had a great time at the cottonplant with y'all + dad. freezing❄️ presents are wrapped and ready to go to north dakota 😊🎁🎄🎅 only 9 more days until i get to see that smile again! oh you just don't know how much i've missed you! rt 😍 rt real men do cry. rt basically how i'm handling life right now rt we elves try to stick to the four main food groups: candy, candy canes, candy corns and syrup. rt when you want the new nike glow pair, but you ballin on a budget rt i like to spread christmas cheer, by singing loud for all to hear. #ss 💜 rt merica. love you!
